Headline: Temporary #7 Harrison Reroute near Damen/Polk.
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted near Damen/Polk.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Western, Jackson, Loomis, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Western buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Van Buren, Western, Harrison, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #70 Division Reroute near Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted near Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Division/Kolmar.

Westbound buses will operate via Division, Kolmar, Augusta, Cicero, Division and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kilbourn, Division, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #65 Grand Reroute near Grand/Orleans
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses temp. rerouted near Grand/Orleans

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Westbound buses will operate via Grand, Wells, Illinois, New Orleans, Grand, and resume normal route.

Eastbound buses will operate via Grand, Orleans, Illinois, Wells, Illinois and resume normal route

Allow extra travel time.
